query:
SELECT 
                    p.id,
                    p.phrase_text,
                    p.active,
                    p.created_by,
                    p.created_at,
                    p.updated_at,
                    COALESCE(uep.phrase_id IS NOT NULL, false) as is_excluded,
                    0.0::real as rank
                FROM phrases p
                LEFT JOIN user_excluded_phrases uep ON p.id = uep.phrase_id AND uep.user_id = $1
                WHERE p.active = true
                ORDER BY p.created_at DESC
                LIMIT $2 OFFSET $3
